body.description: The Dyson V8 cordless vacuum cleaner is engineered with the power, versatility, tools and run time to clean homes with pets. Dyson’s de-tangling Motorbar™ cleaner head deep cleans carpets and hard floors with hair removal vanes that clear long hair and pet hair from the brush bar. The innovative Hair screw tool with a conical brush bar is perfect for cleaning upholstery and pet beds. The Dyson V8 has advanced, whole-machine filtration that captures pet dander and fine dust, expelling cleaner air. Thanks to the cordless format, it also transforms into a handheld vacuum with one click so you can clean up high, down low and everywhere in-between. Comes with a 2-year warranty and lifetime Dyson support.¹ Actual run time will vary based on power mode and/or attachments used.²In Boost mode. All other modes achieve at least 99.97% filtration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep cleans your whole home Engineered to pick up dirt, dust and hair from hard floors and carpets. Quickly transforms to a handheld vacuum – for all around your home and car. Engineered for homes with pets Dyson’s latest de-tangling technology removes stubborn hair from all around your home. De-tangles hair automatically Polycarbonate hair removal vanes on the Motorbar cleaner head automatically clear wrapped hair from the brush bar as you clean.

Features Sucks up long hair & pet hair The Hair screw tool’s de-tangling conical brush bar removes hair from pet beds, car seats and stairs. Whole-machine filtration Pet dander is a source of indoor air pollution. Dyson's fully sealed system captures dust and seals in 99.99% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.² No-touch bin emptying Hygienic ejection mechanism drives out dirt and dust in one action – so you don’t need to touch it. Hair screw tool The conical brush bar removes hair from pet beds, car seats, and stairs quickly.

Transforms to a handheld Small enough for hard-to-reach places around your home. Powerful and long-lasting enough to clean your whole car too. Easily reaches up high Lightweight and ergonomic to clean high-up places with one smooth motion. Two cleaning modes Switch between two power modes as you clean for the right balance of power and run time where you need it. More energy efficiency everywhere else. Neatly stores and charges Stores and recharges your Dyson V8 vacuum, so it’s always ready for use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, easy to use, works great on pet hair!
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum picks up dirt and pet hair very well! It works just as well, if not better than our canister vacuum!It makes vacuuming fast and easy!Regular mode works great on hard floors.Although Max mode works great on carpet, it doesn’t hold a charge long in Max mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life Changing and so satisfying
reviews.reviewText: One of the best investments I’ve purchased recently. It’s super light weight, suction is out of this world, the air feels so much cleaner after one use and it’s extremely easy to dump. Also super satisfying to see how much it gathers in a short amount of time. At first I wished the battery life lasted longer, but that was because I had it on turbo the whole time. But I’ve learned when I need to use turbo vs not and I’ll switch h back in forth (which is super easy) and it will last for the full upstairs and the steps and some of downstairs before it needs charged again. I have a 2,500 square foot home. I also have 2 motorized vacuums in my house, but there is nothing like a Dyson! It just does the job so much better, especially on carpet. I also have a golden retriever that sheds a ton, and a cat! So I love all the different attachments to clean everything, but just the floor. Totally worth the money! And the fact that it’s cordless and light weight makes it so easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very handy tool.Exceptional engineering, every little thing is well thought out.The charging station mounts to the wall and is easy to plug the unit in and out.The cord from the station can also be removed to use with the unit instead of using the battery only.Extremely light weight and maneuverable, and very good suction.Factors to concider:Much smaller than standard vacuum cleaners, meaning more passes are required for the same amount of space; the light weight and maneuverability mitigate this somewhat.Fully charged battery will last long enough for thoroughly cleaning a 2-3 bedroom apartment or a single floor of a family home. It is not enough to clean the whole family home without needing to recharge or using a cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, great suction, portable
reviews.reviewText: There’s not much negative to say about this vacuum. It has great suction and it’s very lightweight. Small enough that it can be stored just about anywhere, but unless it is kept plugged in, it will lose its charge - something to keep in mind. The bin is not that large and has to be emptied frequently if vacuuming large spaces, especially in a house with a lot of girls and a lot of hair like ours, but I guess it’s a trade off for the lightweight and portability. If there was one thing I would change, and probably would not have purchased had I known about it beforehand, is the on switch. It would be great if it could lock into place while using, but with this model, you have to hold it down the entirety of the vacuum cycle and my finger is numb and painful by the time I’m finished. The switch is also on the carry handle and very easy to trigger it on by accident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and efficient
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. I got about 8 different heads, so modularity is high. Instructions are clear. The swivel head provides lots of mobility. Emptying the collection chamber is easy and precludes the need for bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum really works well for me. It has great suction, even on carpeting, its light weight makes it easy to move around and even go upstairs if I need it up there. It picks up little scraps of paper really easily and I am surprised at the size of item it will suction up into the chamber. Then when the chamber is full, this vacuum is so easy to empty!! I purchased a knockoff a few about a year ago, thinking I would save some money, it was difficult to empty so I finally broke down and bought the Dyson, the real deal and I am happy that I did. My only complaint is that I wish the charge would last a little bit longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Assembled in less than 5 minutes! Attaches to the wall nicely with the power cord incorporated so it automatically connects when hanging it up...no loose cord hanging down when not plugged in. It has great suction power and the best feature for me is that it gets under beds and furniture where large vacuums can't get to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Loving this vacuum. The quality is pretty great. It’s lightweight and the cordless spec is super convenient especially for cleaning up little messes all day with kids. The battery doesn’t last too long but just charge it and run it again.
Excellent product but no instructions included. Difficult to figure out without instructions
We would like to see the battery last substantially longer than it does.

reviews.reviewerName: Material y acabado de buena calidad, solo que armarla es muy difícil
reviews.reviewText: Muy fácil de manejar, aspira súper bien y la puedes usar todo el tiempo como escoba, comprenlaaaa la va a amar!!

reviews.reviewTitle: It does what it is supposed to do
reviews.reviewText: Not my first Dyson product. I have never been disappointed by this company.This tool is efficient, light and easy to use.I like it!

Just what I needed for short jobs. It comes with a convenient hanger to put it up on the wall & the charger threads through that. It came with a 2 yr. warranty and was easy to register. The quick start guide was great and within a couple of minutes I was using it. It doesn't hold a charge for too long, maybe 10 minutes, but that's enough vacuuming for me. I use a robot vacuum to do most areas but it doesn't do corners or around furniture legs so the combo is working for me.
